body.name: BISSELL® MYair™+ Air Purifier with HEPA Filter for Small Room and Home, Quiet Air Cleaner for Allergens, Pets, Dust, Dander, Pollen, Smoke, Hair, Odors, 3179A
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 5 hrs 51 mins.
features: Every Purchase Saves Pets. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.
Small Room Filtration. Perfect for small to medium rooms like bedrooms, offices, nurseries, and dorms.
AHAM Verifide. Filters rooms 102 sq ft providing 4.8 air changes/hour, 165 sq ft with three air changes/hour, 248 sq ft with two air changes per hours, and 496 sq ft with one air change per hour.
360 Degrees of Simply Clean Air. 3-in-1 pre-, H13 HEPA and carbon filter captures large and fine particles, home odors, odors from pets, and VOCs.

Medical-grade HEPA Filter. Captures 99.97% of particles 0.3 microns and smaller on lowest fan speed, removing airborne irritants like dust, pet dander, pollen, and smoke like that from wildfires, cooking and smoking.
Low Energy & Whisper Quiet. Energy Star certified and equipped with three fan speeds, the lowest of them working at a calming 27 dB(A).
Adjustable Soft Glow Night Light. Choose from no light, low or high, and any brightness in-between simply by pressing, holding and releasing the button at your desired level.

Easy Filter Maintenance. Filter change indicator will inform you when it’s time for new filters. Filters should be replaced approximately every four months. Only use genuine BISSELL Replacement Filters to ensure excellent performance. Search B09HW98WJB.
body.description: Enjoy Simply Clean Air from a brand you've trusted to clean your floors for nearly 145 years with BISSELL MYair+ air purifier. With its intuitive controls, getting clean indoor air has never been easier. Air flows up through the bottom of MYair+ air purifier and passes through its 3-in-1 HEPA, carbon and pre-filter, which makes capturing unwanted allergens, irritants and odors in your home’s air a breeze. MYair+ air purifier has three fan speeds that operate at pleasant-sounding levels, the lowest of which is whisper-quiet, so it’s perfect for bedrooms or nurseries. It also has a unique night light that can be turned on and off or set to to low or high, and any brightness in between simply by pressing, holding and releasing at the level you prefer. The compact size and versatility of MYair+ air purifier also make it easy to incorporate into any room, and it’s ideal for purifying those smaller spaces like a home office. And every purchase of this air purifier helps save pets! BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3-Stage Filtration Captures 99.97% of particles 0.3 microns and smaller from your home's air when on lowest fan speed.

Wide Coverage MYair+ can filter the air 4.8 times per hour in an enclosed space up to 100 square feet. Reliable Air Purification CADR rated for 100 square foot spaces. CADR: smoke 65, dust 70, pollen 69 cfm. Expertly Designed for Simply Clean Air Intuitive controls, easy filter maintenance, and reliable performance from a trusted brand in homecare. Genuine BISSELL Replacement Filters We recommend replacing the filter once every four months for your best clean.
Bedroom Nursery or Child's Room Home Office Living Room
Meet BISSELL's MYair Air Purifiers! MYair Pro, MYair+ and MYair Hub air purifiers all feature Premium HEPA Filtration and sleek new designs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek, Powerful Unit
reviews.reviewText: I received my Bissell purifier just over two weeks ago. I was impressed with the simple, minimalist packaging - the unit was well protected but did not come in excessive amounts of packaging. The instructions were easy to follow, and the unit was able to be set up in a matter of minutes from receiving.The unit itself is very sleek and modern looking, it doesn't have the industrial plastic look of some of the other models on the market. It blends into both my office and bedroom well without sticking out, and is small enough to be placed on a nightstand, dresser, or can stand alone on the floor.The unit has 3 different speeds. My only note is the highest speed is a little loud for an office, but it works great as white noise to sleep to. The middle speed is barely able to be heard, and the lowest setting is completely quiet. The unit can also have a night light turned on with two different brightness levels, or it can be completely dark.The filter on the unit is very easy to get to and change. I have already noticed the Bissel Air Purifier helping my allergies, and I wake up each morning feeling less congested.Overall, I am very happy with the unit, and have considered getting a second so I can keep one in both my office and bedroom instead of moving it back and forth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really helps air quality
reviews.reviewText: I really like this purifier. It has a sleek look so it doesn't stick out, and is a good size ( not too small or too large). It works really well. There is no noise on two lowest settings and the highest speed has a fan sound but it isn't obnoxious. People expect no noise at all which is weird because I have never seen any kind of fan that is completely silent. The only down side to this is the price of the filters. Especially when they need replaced every two or three months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, Sleek, and SO Worth the Price
reviews.reviewText: I receive the BISSELL MYair+ Air Purifier just before a weekend away. Upon my return, I noticed my apartment smelled of mildew and dust after just a few days without fresh air. I decided to set up the purifier the minute I got home, and much to my surprise, it was so simple to start! The instructions are concise and use helpful images to show you what you need to do before turning it on - which basically consists of removing the plastic surrounding the filter. Once that’s done, you just choose a spot and plugin! We chose to set it up in our living room. I was nervous about the noise it would make as we read, work, and watch tv in that area, but it is so quiet. It’s barely audible. Actually, I had to turn it on and off a couple of times to make sure it was actually working! The BISSELL MYair+ Air Purifier is sleek and modern and I appreciate the neutral grey color. It sits like a small piece of furniture that is easy to overlook, but pleasant to spot when your eye does land on it. A few hours after set up. I realized the mildew smell was completely gone and the air (combined with an AC unit) felt fresh and light. It’s common in an old apartment to actually feel the air. Humidity and dust can settle like a fog in those small spaces. With the BISSELL MYair+ Air Purifier, I can hardly feel it at all. My only problem with the BISSELL MYair+ Air Purifier is that now I need one more for our bedroom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good at its Job
reviews.reviewText: I have only had this product for a couple days, but I can tell it is working already. One thing my wife and I like about it is it's design. This item can be displayed for all to see as it has a cool design, but is compact enough to tuck away. Also, it works really well. Within a couple days my wife and I have noticed that the air in our living room has "freshened up". When living in our own home you get accustomed to your house smell. We have definitely noticed a difference. Also, this machine is very quiet on the medium setting. High is a bit too loud for our liking. This would be a great white noise machine for someone, just not me. All in all this is a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and the night light feature is great
reviews.reviewText: Really easy to use. Works great in our bedroom. Night light feature is great. Stays fairly quiet unless using on the highest setting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I live in a non-smoking apartment community. However, someone keeps smoking in their apartment and the complex manager has given me nothing but excuses. I have respiratory issues that are service-connected. I can’t find a way to do anything about the cigarette smoke coming through my vents, but this air purifier has been amazing. I used to wake up and feel like I had been at some hole in the wall bar all night. Like back in my 20s. 😂 Now this air filter clears the smoke smell out of my bedroom fast as I sleep and I wake up to no cigarette smell in my hair. I have noticed it’s helped my dog as well because she was waking up with serious eye boogers because of this smoking neighbor and now those have minimized tremendously. When the neighbor isn’t smoking in their apartment this air purifier works so well that my bedroom smells like when I’ve lived out in the country and could smell pure fresh country air.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to set up. I keep the fan speed on medium and it makes hardly any fan noise. The fan noise is more noticeable on the high setting. I've only had it since yesterday evening so I cannot comment on how well it filters the air yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and stylish air purifier!
reviews.reviewText: I was in need of an air purifier for my new baby's nursery and came across this one and had to snag it up. I really like the style of it, and after getting it and taking it out of the packaging, I'm happy with my purchase.Couple of things to note:--IF you don't read the user guide, make sure to take the plastic wrapping off the filter before you use it--I had to turn it upside down to get the bottom back on after taking the wrapping off so I could align the 'unlock' & 'lock' - a little finicky, but didn't take long--I like that it has a night light and a USB port to charge your phone--It has three levels, level 1 and 2 are pretty quiet and level 3 is a bit louder but it's almost like a natural sound machine for the baby's room which I likeIn short, I recommend buying this air purifier if you're looking for something for a bedroom or smaller room.
